T02D2906:286b-34: po bzlas la smyug ma ring po'i rtse mo la
T02D2906:286b-35: btags te shar phyogs su gzugs dang /
T02D2906:286b-36: rdo rje re ba bsngags pa'i lcags kyi phye mas ra bya ba dang /
T02D2906:286b-37: rdo rje dra ba'i sngags kyis lcags kyi phye ma
T02D2906:286b-38: la brgya bzlas pas ri mo bris nas rdo rje
T02D2906:286b-40: dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i ral gris bsrung ba dang /
T02D2906:286b-41: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtse gsum pas bsrung ba dang /
T02D2906:286b-42: 'phrog ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad bris pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2906:286b-43: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarb'a mu khe bhya: sarba ta th'a ga te bhy'a: kambha /
T02D2906:286b-44: badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:286b-46: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so //
T02D2906:287a-1: ta th'a ga ta bhya: sarbba mu khe bhya: sarbba badzra pra kar /
T02D2906:287a-2: ta th'a ga ta gha ta dza na ka ku ru ku ru tsa kra na sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:287a-3: rdo rje ra ba'i sngags so //
T02D2906:287a-4: na ma sarbba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarbba mu
T02D2906:287a-5: khe bhya: sarbba th'a badzra panydza ra ni kshi pa
T02D2906:287a-6: ka ga na kam sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:287a-7: rdo rje dra ba'i sngags so //
T02D2906:287a-8: brgyad pa tshar gcad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2906:287a-9: dgu pa bskul ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe lugs su blugs pa'am bris pa'am /
T02D2906:287a-10: brkos pa'am brdungs pa la sogs pa mdun du bzhag
T02D2906:287a-11: la bdag nyid cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed la
T02D2906:287a-12: / snying po dang bskul ba'i sngags byar la lha la bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2906:287a-13: de la lha drug ni 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi
T02D2906:287a-14: dbang du byas nas dang po stong pa nyid du
T02D2906:287a-15: bsgoms nas / nam: sarbba ta th'a ga ta nam
T02D2906:287a-16: aom sarbba bi shuddha badzra h'um zhes bya bas snod
T02D2906:287a-17: bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o
T02D2906:287a-18: bsgoms nas / // don dam pa'i lha ste dang po'o //
T02D2906:287a-19: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las kun rd zob kyi snang ba /
T02D2906:287a-20: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2906:287a-21: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um tsandra aa sa
T02D2906:287a-22: na zhes bya bas rig byed kyi sgra'i tshul du
T02D2906:287a-23: rtog bral gyi shes pas sgra brnyan gyi tshul du
T02D2906:287a-24: snang ba gdan bskyed pa ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D2906:287a-25: de nas rtogs pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas yi
T02D2906:287a-26: ge h'um kshmi bsams pa ni yig 'bru'i lha ste
T02D2906:287a-27: gsum pa'o // h'um las 'od zer phreng ba dang
T02D2906:287a-28: bcas pas spro bsdu byas pa las rdo rje tse
T02D2906:287a-29: lnga pa'i phyag rgya bsam pa ste phyag rgya'i lha
T02D2906:287a-30: gsum pa'o // sta bzhi pa'o // phyag mtshan nas
T02D2906:287a-31: 'od zer 'phro 'du byas pa las sku phyag rgya
T02D2906:287a-32: che na po'i lha na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am
T02D2906:287a-33: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
T02D2906:287a-34: tee lo kya bi dza ya h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2906:287a-35: khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhal gcig
T02D2906:287a-36: pa phyag gnyis pa gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgyas rdo
T02D2906:287a-38: g-yas pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas dbang phyug chen po dang aum mnan pa /
T02D2906:287a-39: rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po stobs po che
T02D2906:287a-40: zhes grags pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can bsams
T02D2906:287a-41: la m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2906:287a-42: snying gar na ma: sa manta badzra n'am kri ta kri ta kri ta dza yanti sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:287a-43: zhes pas snying gar dpal be'u bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:287a-44: dbral bar sngags dang phyag rgyas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:287a-45: lkog mar sngags dang phyag rgyas tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:287a-46: spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas dbu'i gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:287a-47: rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil du 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:287b-0: sku phyag rgya chen @287b bo'i lha ste lnga pa'o //
T02D2906:287b-1: de nas lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bcu gsum pa'am ta ba ti lha lnga pa'am /
T02D2906:287b-3: rdo rje pho nya mo bcus bskor ba 'am /
T02D2906:287b-4: pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags rig pa mchog gi rgyud dam /
T02D2906:287b-5: sna tshogs rab tu grub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa
T02D2906:287b-6: rnams kyis bskul ba'i sngags dang spel nas bzlas pa
T02D2906:287b-7: bya ste bsnyen pa dang po'o //
T02D2906:287b-8: bsnyen pa'i tshe bum pa bskyed nas bum pa la bzlas pa bsnyen pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D2906:287b-9: spyin sreg bya zhing sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pa bsnyen pa gsum pa'o //
T02D2906:287b-10: ras ris sam sku gzugs bzhag nas sngags dang phyag rgya zlos pa ste bsnyen pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D2906:287b-11: zhe ba'i rdzas mar ram 'o ma mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2906:287b-12: rgyas pa'i rdzas gi wang ngam sre ta aanydza na la sogs pa gzhag pa'am /
T02D2906:287b-13: dbang la mtshal dang tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa gzhag pa dang /
T02D2906:287b-14: mngon spyod la khrag gam zhag gam dug la sogs pa mdun du gzhag la dro ba'am 'bar b'am /
T02D2906:287b-15: 'phar ba'am du bar 'thul ba'am rul ba la sogs
T02D2906:287b-16: pa'i rtags byung ba'i bar du sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2906:287b-17: bcing ba ni bsnyen pa lnga pa'o //
T02D2906:287b-18: nad pa la sogs pa thag ring na yang rims
T02D2906:287b-19: dang dug dang nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nad
T02D2906:287b-20: pa de'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2906:287b-21: bcing ba dang / rgyas pa la tshe 'phel ba dang /
T02D2906:287b-23: nor 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02D2906:287b-24: dbang la mi rigs bzhi dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2906:287b-25: lha dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
T02D2906:287b-26: klu dang lha ma yin gyi gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang /
T02D2906:287b-28: mngon spyod la bsad pa dang /
T02D2906:287b-29: bskrad pa dang rmugs pa dang /
T02D2906:287b-30: rengs par bya ba'i phyir de'i gzugs brnyan byas la
T02D2906:287b-31: sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba ni bsnyen pa drug
T02D2906:287b-32: pa'o // de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ldang bar 'dod pa'i cho ga bcu gcig bya ste /
T02D2906:287b-36: rang dang sgrub pa'i grogs po dang /
T02D2906:287b-37: byis pa chung ba la 'di ltar bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2906:287b-44: shu dag rnams la na mo badzra p'a ni sya tsi li tsi li /
T02D2906:288a-2: badzra p'a ni ka na sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:288a-3: badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:288a-4: de bas na dha r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:288a-5: ri yas'a r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:288a-6: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang sman gyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-10: lha'i bum pa gos kyis dgab ba dang /
T02D2906:288a-11: go cha bskon nas ru dr'a ksha gdong gcig pa'am /
T02D2906:288a-12: rdo rje 'bru yang lag pa g-yon par bcangs la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa'am /
T02D2906:288a-14: rdo rje'i rigs kyi yi ge brgya pa bzlas pas lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bskang bar bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-15: ldang ba'i tshe mtshan thog thag bsdu ba dang lingga dang sman yang gos kyis dgab par bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-16: phreng ba dang sngags dang lha la bcol bar bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-18: lha mi brjed pas ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-19: bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs so //
T02D2906:288a-20: de ltar bsnyen pa zhag bdun nam /
T02D2906:288a-21: zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du bsnyen
T02D2906:288a-22: pa byas las sbyang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gam
T02D2906:288a-23: / ras ris sam sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la
T02D2906:288a-24: nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhag bdun nam gsum bya'o zhes
T02D2906:288a-25: / gsungs so // rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor byed
T02D2906:288a-26: pa'i tshe sngon du sa'i cho ga bya ba ni
T02D2906:288a-27: skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu dang /
T02D2906:288a-28: khyim khyu mchog la bab pa'i dus su sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D2906:288a-29: thog mar bdag nyid bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram h'um mdzad kyi skur bskyed la mandal bya /
T02D2906:288a-33: gtor ma bshams las sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba dang /
T02D2906:288a-34: 'khor la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-36: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings kyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-38: pus mo nub tsam du brkos la /
T02D2906:288a-39: spos chus sprus pa'i sas bkang ste /
T02D2906:288a-40: rdo rje m'a ma k'i'i sngags dang /
T02D2906:288a-41: phyag rgyas sman lnga dang rin po che lnga gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2906:288a-42: sa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas mthon dman dang /
T02D2906:288a-45: ngam grog dang rus pa dang sdong dum dang thal ba dan /
T02D2906:288a-50: grog sbur la sogs pa de rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba spangs te /
T02D2906:288a-51: shar dang byang du gzhol ba nye 'khor na chu mod pa /
T02D2906:288a-52: khor 'khor yug tu me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa /
T02D2906:288b-0: @288b 'o ma can gyi shing skyes ba zhi ba las dkar po /
T02D2906:288b-3: mngon spyod la sa gzhi nag po der sa spyad par bya'o //
T02D2906:288b-4: sa gzhi 'thas pa dang khang thog dang rdo leb dang /
T02D2906:288b-7: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gam phur bus gdab pa'i gnas sus gzhi sbyang mi dgos so //
T02D2906:288b-8: sa gzud pa ni dang por ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2906:288b-9: tsandan dang gla rtsis byugs nas me tog sil ma la sogs pa bkram ste /
T02D2906:288b-10: khro bo k'i li k'i l'a ya bzlas pas bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2906:288b-11: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis sa sbyang ba dang /
T02D2906:288b-12: rdo rje'i rigs la khyad bar du bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis sa gzung ngo //
T02D2906:288b-13: sa brtag pa ni ri bo mchog gi dngos grub 'thob po //
T02D2906:288b-14: mtsho 'gram du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po //
T02D2906:288b-15: dur khrod la sogs par 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po //
T02D2906:288b-16: ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten kyi drung du sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob bo //
T02D2906:288b-18: nags tshan du gnod sbyin mo 'grub po //
T02D2906:288b-19: phug tu mngag gzhug pa rnams 'grub po //
T02D2906:288b-20: bsnyen pa'i tshe tshar gcad pa'i cho ga sngar bshad
T02D2906:288b-21: pa bzhin du byas pas ni sa bsrung bar 'gyur
T02D2906:288b-22: ro // de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang /
T02D2906:288b-23: sgrub pa'i grogs bos sngar bshar pa bzhin du khrus dang gos dang rgyan btags pa dang /
T02D2906:288b-24: mchod pa rnams byin gyis brlab cing snga ma bzhin
T02D2906:288b-25: du bdag nyid cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed la
T02D2906:288b-26: / snga ma bzhin du ri rab kyi rtse mor bsams nas /
T02D2906:288b-27: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgyas sa'i lha mo spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D2906:288b-28: ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo lcags kyus g-yab pa dang /
T02D2906:288b-30: tsu ru kunda badzra p'a ni /
T02D2906:288b-31: na mo buddh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2906:288b-32: yom pra ti sa sa bi pa ya ta sanni
T02D2906:288b-33: hi to bha ba zhes brjod cing bzhugs su gsol
T02D2906:288b-34: lo // de nas mchod yon dang bcas pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod la /
T02D2906:288b-35: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2906:288b-36: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2906:288b-37: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2906:288b-38: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2906:288b-39: skyob ba sh'a kya seng ge yis //
T02D2906:288b-40: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02D2906:288b-41: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02D2906:288b-42: pham par byas de dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2906:288b-43: zhes bya bas dbang du gsol lo //
T02D2906:289a-1: phyag rgyas sa la lan gsum reg par bya'o //
T02D2906:289a-2: de nas 'khor la gtor ma byin gyis brlab cin bsngos nas /
T02D2906:289a-3: sa'i lha mo dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2906:289a-4: de nas sta gon gyi bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i
T02D2906:289a-5: cho ga byas te ma dang ta ma dang ta
T02D2906:289a-6: las mig gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed
T02D2906:289a-7: la / mig 'bras h'um las rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:289a-8: rkang mthil du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la khro bo'i skur bsgoms la /
T02D2906:289a-9: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis ngan song sbyong ba nas
T02D2906:289a-10: 'byung ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2906:289a-11: pas bstod la de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis khro
T02D2906:289a-13: chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las //
T02D2906:289a-14: 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spang ste //
T02D2906:289a-15: thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa //
T02D2906:289a-16: khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2906:289a-18: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa //
T02D2906:289a-19: zhes pas kyang bka' bsgo ste /
T02D2906:289a-20: de rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2906:289a-21: rig sngags 'chang grub pa rgan po dang /
T02D2906:289a-22: rgan mo rnams dengs shig ces bya bas bgegs bskrad ba dang /
T02D2906:289a-23: h'um h'um 'gro ba 'dzin pa yis ni byas zin gyi //
T02D2906:289a-24: h'um h'um gdug pa'i yi can gang yin pha zad song //
T02D2906:289a-25: h'um h'um khro bo'i rgyal po sdang mig 'bar ba yis //
T02D2906:289a-26: h'um h'um bsregs nas thal ba bzhin du byas sa re //
T02D2906:289a-27: zhar phyogs nas ni char chen 'bab //
T02D2906:289a-28: me phyogs glo bur snang ba 'byung //
T02D2906:289a-30: bden bral sems can la 'jigs bye //
T02D2906:289a-31: chu phyogs gshin rje 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02D2906:289a-32: rlung gi phyogs nas tshub ma 'byung //
T02D2906:289a-33: gnod sbyin pho mo byang phyogs gnas //
T02D2906:289a-34: dbang ldan phyogs nas sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D2906:289a-35: steng nas mthu chen lha rnams dang //
T02D2906:289a-37: gang dag mtshan mo rgyu ba yi //
T02D2906:289a-38: bgegs rnams thams cad 'gro bar gyis //
T02D2906:289a-39: zhes bya ba brjod la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags ring gis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2906:289a-40: de nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyi bskor ba lan gsum
T02D2906:289a-41: byas la 'greng la thal mo mchog mar gzhag la
T02D2906:289a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2906:289a-43: sngags ni sngar bshad pas bya'o //
T02D2906:289a-44: de nas stang stabs bya ste /
T02D2906:289a-45: g-yas brkyang dang g-yon bskyang gis phyogs bzhir bya ba dang /
T02D2906:289b-0: thal mo @289b sbyar te rked pa'i gnas su gzhag la /
T02D2906:289b-1: rting pa phrad de mig thur la bltas la /
T02D2906:289b-2: rdo rje phur bu sred med kyi bus sa 'og rim pa bdun g-yo bar bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-3: h'um 'brug gi sgra lta bu dang /
T02D2906:289b-4: rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing rdo rje gar bskor
T02D2906:289b-5: nas legs par blangs pa'i rdo rje 'phen pa ngag
T02D2906:289b-6: bsdu ba bya'o // de nas khro bo dang phyag
T02D2906:289b-7: brnyan dang bran mo dang pho nya mo rnams spro
T02D2906:289b-8: bsdu ba bya'o // zhing / rdo rje be con chogs pa'i g-yas brkyang dang /
T02D2906:289b-9: dbyug pa dang mdung thung dang /
T02D2906:289b-12: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02D2906:289b-13: gtun shing la sogs pa thogs pa'i khro bo bgegs
T02D2906:289b-14: gzhom pa'i stang stabs bya'o / tshangs pa'i gnas man
T02D2906:289b-15: chad gser gyis gzhi yan chad kyi lha dang lha
T02D2906:289b-16: ma yin dang / gnod sbyin rnams gcig tu bsdus nas /
T02D2906:289b-17: rdo rje me dang rlung gi khro bos bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i tshul du mchongs
T02D2906:289b-19: nas g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkang bya ba dang rdo
T02D2906:289b-20: rje khu tshur gnyis rked par bzhag nas lus po
T02D2906:289b-22: rdo rje gsor zhing rkang pa g-yas g-yon sa la gdab pa dang /
T02D2906:289b-24: rkang pa brlar gzhag la lus po bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-25: g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i yi khu tshur gyi nang du
T02D2906:289b-26: g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum btsugs pa bton la ral
T02D2906:289b-27: gri shubs nas 'byin pa bzhin du ral gri'i phyag
T02D2906:289b-29: rkang pa gnyis gshibs la rod rje spyi bo la bskor zhing 'khor lo 'phang ba'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-30: rgyas par ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2906:289b-31: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud phyi ma las blta bar bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-32: de ltar stang stabs rdzogs nas /
T02D2906:289b-33: lngar bshad pa'i tshar bcad pa'i cho gas kyang 'dir rab dang dra bas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2906:289b-34: de nas seng ldeng ngam lcags las byas pa'i phur
T02D2906:289b-35: bu stod khro bo smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa
T02D2906:289b-36: lta bu bskyed la phur bu'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad

T02D2906:296a-26: gum gyis yi ge bris la slob ma dang slob
T02D2906:296a-27: dpon mnyam du lan bdun gyi bar du bklags par
T02D2906:296a-28: bya'o // des sngags kyi gnang ba thob par 'gur ro //
T02D2906:296a-29: dkyil 'khor mthong nas dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
T02D2906:296a-30: slob dpon go 'phang thob pa'i phyir /
T02D2906:296a-31: dang po'i dbang du bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2906:296a-32: rig sngags thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2906:296a-33: gnyis pa'i dbang du bshad pa yin /

T02D2906:296a-35: gsum pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin //

T02D2906:296a-37: cho ga bzang po de bshad do //
T02D2906:296a-39: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang po'o //
T02D2906:296a-40: rig sngags bzlas pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D2906:296a-41: bgegs rnams zhi ba gsum ba'o //
T02D2906:296a-44: ngan song gsum du mi lhung ba dang /
T02D2906:296b-0: mi @296b khom pa brgyad spangs pa dang //
T02D2906:296b-1: tshe rabs dran zhing longs spyod che //

T02D2906:296b-4: mtho ris gnas su skye bar shog /
T02D2906:296b-5: ces smon lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02D2906:296b-6: gal te sdom pa 'dzin par mi nus pa'am /
T02D2906:296b-7: nad pa'am bar chad mang du 'byung ba'am /
T02D2906:296b-9: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gtses pa la khrus kyi cho ga bya ste /
T02D2906:296b-10: bdud rtse'i 'khyil par bskyed la gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2906:296b-11: lha rnams kyi sngags zlos shing yungs kar gyi sa brab pa dang /
T02D2906:296b-12: rma bya'i sgro'i dbus su phyag rgya bcings pa ni
T02D2906:296b-13: bin du pa la zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2906:296b-14: sngags zlos shing bya ba pa dang /
T02D2906:296b-15: ru dr'a ksha gdong gcig pa'i rin po che rma
T02D2906:296b-16: med pa lus la btags nas bsrung ba bya ste
T02D2906:296b-17: / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2906:296b-18: mgon po thugs rjes 'chad ba'i lha ;
T02D2906:296b-19: / rig sngags rgyal po dge ba can //

T02D2906:296b-21: mgon po khyod kyi byin rlabs mdzod //

T02D2906:296b-27: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las grol //
T02D2906:296b-28: zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02D2906:296b-29: bzod par gsol bar bya ste /
T02D2906:296b-30: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02D2906:296b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2906:296b-32: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2906:296b-33: rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi lha bum pa'i lha dang gcig
T02D2906:296b-34: tu bsres la / rma bya'i sgros dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2906:296b-35: phyag rgya rnams phyis nas khrus kyi gzhong pa bzhag
T02D2906:296b-36: tu bsres la / ste / ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2906:296b-37: thugs rje can gyi thabs chen gyi //
T02D2906:296b-38: zhi yang sems can don du ni //
T02D2906:296b-39: dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur //
T02D2906:296b-40: zhes bstod la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings kyis
T02D2906:296b-41: kyang mtshams bcad gnas lngar rdo rjes gtug cing byin
T02D2906:296b-42: gyis brlab / sems dpa' gtsug tor dang /
T02D2906:296b-43: gzi brjid phung po bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2906:296b-44: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzod spur bzhag ste /
T02D2906:297a-0: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am @297a * //
T02D2906:297a-1: aa bu dzu zhes bya bas mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2906:297a-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings te /

T02D2906:297a-5: na h'um zhes bya bas gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o
T02D2906:297a-6: // rdo rje 'chol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D2906:297a-7: gu gul gyi dud pas kyang bdug par bya'o //
T02D2906:297a-8: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /

T02D2906:297a-12: kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon zhing bum pa thams
T02D2906:297a-13: cad kyi lha zhu bar bsams la /

T02D2906:297a-20: spyi bo nas rkang ba'i bar du lus thams cad khrus bya'o//
T02D2906:297a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas spyi bor blugs pa dang /

T02D2906:297a-23: lan bdun bzlas pas lte bar blugs par bya'o //

T02D2906:297a-25: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yi //
T02D2906:297a-27: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma rungs pa'i /
T02D2906:297a-28: dgra dang bgegs kyang med par shog //
T02D2906:297a-29: rkun po la sogs med par shog / mu stegs can las rgyal gyur cig //
T02D2906:297a-30: byang chub snying po thob par du //
T02D2906:297a-31: bdud sde bzhi yis mi thub cing //
T02D2906:297a-32: khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya mo //

T02D2906:297a-34: gdon dang rims nad med par shog / ces byas la rma bya'i sgros bya ba par bya'o //
T02D2906:297a-35: de nas rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs lan gnyis gsum bton la khrus lan gsum bya'o //
T02D2906:297a-36: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du /
T02D2906:297a-37: de la bsrung ba byas gos bskon nas med tog gi phreng ba dang /

T02D2906:297a-39: lugs ma spyi bor gdags par bya'o //
